dcterms:creator: T. McCoy
E. Pavlick
T. Linzen
dcterms:description: A dataset created by modifying SNLI examples with single word replacements of different lexical relations, based on WordNet, testing lexical inferences and relatively simple world knowledge.
dcterms:title: Glockner et al. (2018)

dcterms:creator: A. Naik
A. Ravichander
N. Sadeh
C. Rose
G. Neubig
dcterms:description: A dataset composed of a variety of tests motivated by a manual examination and categorization of 100 mistakes made by the best performing model at the time, focusing on various linguistic phenomena.
dcterms:title: Naik et al. (2018)

dcterms:creator: T. McCoy
E. Pavlick
T. Linzen
dcterms:description: An adversarial dataset designed to test syntactic heuristics in NLI systems, consisting of examples generated from manually created templates that break these heuristics.
dcterms:title: McCoy et al. (2019)

dcterms:creator: J. Devlin
M.-W. Chang
K. Lee
K. Toutanova
dcterms:description: A dataset for natural language inference tasks, widely used for training and evaluating NLI models.
dcterms:title: MNLI

dcterms:creator: M. Glockner
V. Shwartz
Y. Goldberg
dcterms:description: A dataset created by modifying SNLI examples with single word replacements of different lexical relations, testing lexical inferences and relatively simple world knowledge.
dcterms:title: SNLI
